title: Have a few bucks to spend...
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: Have a few bucks to spend...
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for a couple PSA graded Old Judges.  Preferably PSA 3-5.

Please PM me with anything you might have available.
How about SGC? I have some nice cards, including a fantastic Griffith.

Thanks Jay, I don't want to have to cross.  Its not as simple as crossing the more modern stuff as PSA and SGC just don't seem to grade OJs in the same manor.

I got the Cushman and Beckley and am very happy with them, thanks!
